title: SOUKYA wins Considerate Hoteliers Award for Spa and Wellness 2015
text:
SOUKYA wins Considerate Hoteliers Award for Spa and Wellness 2015 SOUKYA wins Considerate Hoteliers Award for Spa and Wellness 2015 Details Category: Awards   15:00 Soukya, Whitefield, India has been awarded the Considerate Spa & Wellness Award 2015 by Considerate Hoteliers’ Hotel of the Year Awards. The Considerate Hotelier Awards were announced on 3rd July 2015 at Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park London, judged annually by a formidable panel of experts. 
These are the only awards in the hotel industry which focus solely on Environmental, Sustainable and Socially Responsible performance and this year, include two new categories including the Spa & Wellbeing Award, which was won by Soukya. Soukya www.soukya.com is the world’s first holistic health centre, employing the best medical doctors and embracing therapies from around the world. Owned and managed by world-renowned holistic health practitioner Dr Mathai, it is set in thirty acres of organic farmland in Whitefield, near Bangalore, India. Related articles
